Synopsis:
---------
Two lovers have only a few minutes to change the course of their lives. Lola receives a frantic call from her boyfriend Manni, who has just lost a small fortune belonging to a mafia boss for working. If Lola does not get the money in twenty minutes, Manni will suffer. (PRO)
